Intalacion de librerias: 

```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(viridis)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(plyr)
library(DescTools)
library(data.table)
library(EnvStats)
library(ggplot2)  
library(qcc)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(summarytools)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(viridis)
library(readr)
```

Descargo paquete de Taylor Viz: 

```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
install.packages(c("tayloRswift"))
library(tayloRswift)
```

Importo el dataset: 

```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
taylor_swift_lyrics <- read_csv("taylor_swift_lyrics.csv")
```
